Ho Chi Minh City police
said that from now until before the
Lunar New Year 2024, the traffic police
will organize 10 clusters to carry out thematic
testing of alcohol concentrations all day long.  Night fraud
on the city's roads,
accordingly, Five Clusters check alcohol levels
in the central area and Five Clusters in the
outskirts of the clusters are combined between the
district traffic police force of
Thu Duc city and other agencies.  Station teams of the
traffic police department are located near each other in each cluster,
divided into 4 shifts per day, each shift has
about 20 officers and soldiers participating in handling
violations. Inspection locations change depending
on the actual situation of the campaign.  This
is to promote the prevention and reduction of
traffic accidents caused by alcohol and stimulant levels.

Sugar-coated seafood is creating a
sugar-cuisine fever.  street in
Harbin city in Northern China. This is a
new trend because in the past, most
stalls only sold traditional sugar-coated fruit candy,
not just gourds and sugar-
coated fruit in hourly stalls.  Here,
all kinds of sugar-coated seafood are sold,
such as crab and shrimp, and sugar-coated king prawns. Sugar-
coated seafood is a new flavor and a
new feature. Northeast China
is famous for its culture of eating sugar-coated sweets.
Everything can be sugar-coated, the
new flavor of seafood makes many
passersby curious and excited. This
is the first time I have tasted it and the flavor is
very special, it is fresh and very delicious.
This new dish is very popular.  Sugar-coated fruits are popular.
Usually, they are
sweet. Sugar-coated seafood is
fresh and sweet in a different way, very
delicious.
People consider this a
new change in street food.
new flavors but still
retaining the traditional way of preparing dishes
of the Harbin region.
